show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Shale gas isn’t only a problem at drill sites— it can ruin communities at any place along the pipelines that carry gas... <!--more--> to users or for export.
Today on Connect the Dots Alison Rose Levy speaks with Pramilla Malick of StopMCS.
org and Tanyette Colon of (MUST) Mothers United for Sustainable Technologies about the proposed compressor station planned for Minisink, NY, a community with man 911 survivors.
